website_summaries.verdict: The Canon PowerShot Elph 510 HS hits on design, features, and photo and video quality, but is slightly off target on shooting performance.
pros: The Canon PowerShot Elph 510 HS is an attractive, easy-to-use snapshot camera with a nice wide, long lens, and plenty of shooting options, all in an ultracompact body
cons: The 510 HS's battery can be very short depending on the features you use and its shooting performance is a little behind that of competing models

customer_reviews.title: Great photos and fantastic zoom for such a small camera
customer_reviews.text: Love the camera but I carried it in my back pocket and it turns on and tries to open the lens. Happened several times before I ruined the focus function. I can't find this camera anymore but if you can find one it is a great little camera with big camera quality pictures. I only put 4 stars on the battery life because I never noticed it was going down so I always found it dead when I needed it the most...or so it seemed to me. Actually the battery life is rather good but off brand replacement batteries do not seem to hold a charge as long as the ones that come with the camera.
customer_reviews.author: Jewel M Leasor

customer_reviews.title: Great little camera
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little camera. We had larger 12mp camera but this smaller one takes better videos and is much lighter. I don't know if I like the rechargeable batteries as much as the AAs for electronic devises I used on the other camera. The video also picks up a lot of sounds so the person taking the video will have to watch how loud they talk. We do not own a SLR. If we did this might get less use but because it is small it is still a great choice. Also does HD videos. Seller was great; shipped very fast. I would buy this camera again and plan to use it as our main camera.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Sherbondy

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic.
customer_reviews.text: I bought one for myself a year ago, and recently bought another one for my mom. It is a fantastic high end amateur camera for the price, with a lot of functions, and if you master them you will become much better photographer. When ordering camera order extra batteries. This camera comes with a very weak battery that has a short life. If there was a battery rating for this specific one, I would give 0 stars. I love this camera, great buy, highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Aramat

customer_reviews.title: Only lasted 3 years
customer_reviews.text: Took some great photos, but after 6 months in the tropics it started malfunctioning. Now I use my Samsung Galaxy Note 8 which is spectacular.
customer_reviews.author: globesource2

customer_reviews.title: neat little camera
customer_reviews.text: I had just bought a new digital camera and my brother really liked it so he asked me to find a good one for him online. I looked around and after a couple weeks I decided on this one. The reason I got this one is because the price was right and it is a very good camera. He really likes it because it blows away his last camera and it is touch screen and the zoom was really good. He has no complaints about it and is really happy with it.Thank You.
customer_reviews.author: greg r

customer_reviews.title: Best Camera I ever had!
customer_reviews.text: Let me start by saying I buy a lot of stuff at Amazon and NEVER write reviews. This camera is AWESOME! I bought this camera for the 12X optical zoom and was concerned about the picture quality because the camera is so small. I was blown away by the quality of the pictures. I just went on vacation and took over 700 pictures in every condition imaginable and the pictures are unbelievable. BUY this camera. It is the cheapest camera I ever bought and the Best camera I ever bought. You'll love it!
customer_reviews.author: Donny

customer_reviews.title: Canon Digital Camera
customer_reviews.text: At first, I didn't like this camera, but then I downloaded the user manual and started looking for help. I like this camera a lot. You can do so many different things with it, which I haven't even touched upon. The only complaint I have is I can't get the carry-strap through the small hole on the side. But, I will eventually as I have tiny crochet hooks which can help out.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ann T. Kline

customer_reviews.title: perfect camera for me
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this on the advice of a friend of a friend who travels into jungles and shoots wildlife. this is a very handy camera for a woman and it takes great pictures. Easy to operate. Ability to correct lighting before and after shooting. Large viewing area so you can really see what you're shooting AND you can bring it way up close before the click! This is a very nice camera.
customer_reviews.author: MikesMom

customer_reviews.title: Good but overheats and has issues.
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited to get this in the mail. The item shipped really fast and the seller had it packaged nicely. Everything was included as stated and the camera had no cosmetic defects. However the battery on the camera and the camera overheats after about 20 mins of use. Also the camera just turns itself off at times in the middle of recording when it gets hot which was not stated in the description. I would have expected it to be stated. It's not anything that is a real hassle but I feel the seller should have been honest about this issue.
customer_reviews.author: Susie Lucas

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this for a in your pocket or purse camera
customer_reviews.author: rfhugs

customer_reviews.title: Great photos
customer_reviews.text: This camera is super. I love the way it captures the light. I have taken photos with this that are similar to others and it produces great photos. the touch screen takes a bit of getting used to, I now love it. less buttons! it is compact for a camera with such a great zoom! I would purchase this camera again... and do recommend it to my friends. I purchased it when it was list price, now it is a super price.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Excllent choice
customer_reviews.text: Amazing features in a very small compact size device. I’m happy from my purchase. My only take on this camera is battery indicator. There is no battery indicator. Your indicator will only flash when your battery is low.. Other than that.. Wow.. Be sure to have a little bit of a firm touch...
customer_reviews.author: Motaz Moniem

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Camera
customer_reviews.text: Anyone that does not want to spend too much money on a camera but wants a very good camera and something light and small would love this Canon PowerShot ELPH 510 HS camera. It works great, it is easy to use, small, light weight and takes great pictures. All the things I need in a camera.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great camera, not so great videocamera
customer_reviews.text: At first we loved this unit. However, when we tried making videos of live music, the sound recording system proved to be not at all up to par. In fact, the sound switches randomly from right to left and back, so that the recordings are essentially not usable. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Canon PowerShot ELPH 510 HS 12.1 MP CMOS Digital Camera
customer_reviews.text: The camera takes great photographs and is very easy to use. The touch screen doesn't seem as responsive as we've come to expect from modern smartphones or tablets but it's not awful. I purchased it as a gift for a family member and they love using it. Not many manual controls, but a great point & shoot.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Mama

customer_reviews.title: Marvelous camera
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item for my granddaughter who is going to China for her high school junior year in 2012-2013. She and I took the camera out for a test and trial run, and it does everything perfectly that she anticipates needing for her trip. It is small, with fine optics, and picture quality. I had a little trouble with the touch screen controls, but being a young person she didn't. This is a great camera for most needs, especially travel.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Camera
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic camera. I love the design of Canon cameras, very intuitive. HD video is outstanding. Also love the large optical zoom; very handy. Was worried about the touch screen, but find it works very well and is faster than selecting from a menu. GREAT
customer_reviews.author: rande

customer_reviews.title: Nice little camera
customer_reviews.text: This camera is lightweight and easy to carry and use. It takes great pictures and very clear close ups. I have taken hundreds of photos with it in the short time I've owned it and the only complaint I have is the time it takes to actually take the picture sometimes....the shutter can be tricky at times.
customer_reviews.author: Bernie

customer_reviews.title: No so great after 4 months
customer_reviews.text: Bought this in April for a NYC trip. worked good for the first 4 months then the battery wont charge or hold a charge. I called Canon and they say to send it back to look at it. 2 weeks later I get a letter saying that it will cost me $165 to have "it" repaired, they never say what is actually wrong with the camera only that it is not covered under warranty. I only paid $225 for the camera. Never again for a Canon
customer_reviews.author: william H

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Amazing
customer_reviews.text: If I could give this camera more stars, I would. This camera was a Christmas gift for my mom and she absolutely loves it! There are so many neat features to the camera...like color swapping, color accenting, fish eye and lots of others. The shutter speed is very fast. The touch screen is very nice and the camera is very simple to use. My mother is not tech-savvy and she has no problem operating this camera. This was a great find and for an amazing price!
customer_reviews.author: Katelynn Glenn

customer_reviews.title: great camera
customer_reviews.text: awesome large, 3.5 inch smart phone-type touch screen. Great zoom. However, in automatic mode, the indoor photos are not good; you need to change to manual and put the right settings to get a better quality photos
customer_reviews.author: Teesla

customer_reviews.title: A gift that was a winner.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift, the reciepient loved it. She said it was very easy to use and the pictures are crystal clear.
customer_reviews.author: Norma

customer_reviews.title: Best Camera
customer_reviews.text: Had this camera for 4 years now. Use in my inspection business. Taken over 11,000 pictures, never failed, great pictures. Best camera I have ever owned
customer_reviews.author: nspector

customer_reviews.title: gift for son
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son and he couldn't be happier. The only thing about it is that is that it's small and my son tends to be hard on electronics, so I made sure I bought the warranty. He loves the camera and used it from the day he got it.
customer_reviews.author: charzweb

customer_reviews.title: The camera is probably fine, but I still have not figured it out ...
customer_reviews.text: The camera is probably fine, but I still have not figured it out quite. it is a bit complicated for a technologically challenged person
customer_reviews.author: Lyalya

customer_reviews.title: A Great, Easy To Use Digital Camera
customer_reviews.text: I really like this camera. I use it more than I use my Canon EOS T5i. In my opinion as a former professional photo-journalist, Canon makes the best digital cameras on the market.
customer_reviews.author: Tripol'e

customer_reviews.title: A Good Camera
customer_reviews.text: The touch screen takes some getting used to. The battery needs to be recharged after just a short time. I bought 4 additional batteries just to be able to use the camera. It takes good pictures and is light weight.
customer_reviews.author: Boulware Franklin

customer_reviews.title: canon elph 510 hs
customer_reviews.text: Very good camera, lots of features, I bought mine a year ago and I am very happy with it, pictures are really nice easy to work the many functions, and is very nice looking camera you can do almost anything with this camera
customer_reviews.author: sac

customer_reviews.title: good camera
customer_reviews.text: I read the small booklet that comes with the camera but I still haven't mastered it yet. Suggest that you play with it for a good while before taking serious photos. The large screen is nice. The touch screen is not all that user friendly and is a little slow to respond to touch.
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: Very nice little camera with 28mm Wide-Angle Lens
customer_reviews.text: Very nice little camera with 28mm Wide-Angle Lens. I use it for home listing picture. cover more areas than regular angle camera.
customer_reviews.author: S L.

customer_reviews.title: Great little camera for everyday use!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera a little over a year ago. The only thing I would change is the battery - it is an odd size/shape. You cannot pick up a second battery charger if you forget to pack yours. The photos are really high quality (I have had mine enlarged to as big as 11X17 without loss of resolution). The settings are easy to understand and change. The touchscreen viewer can be a bit hard to use at times, but there is always the old reliable push button on top.
customer_reviews.author: Leslee Johnston

customer_reviews.title: snapshots
customer_reviews.text: LOVE that it's a touchscreen and so easy to use! Dropped it once but it survived! Had it been a 14mp it would have been perfect but 12mp isn't bad either! the optical is the best part! it can zooom very very close and perfect when i bought just in time for graduation
customer_reviews.author: hwang

customer_reviews.title: Live this camera - takes great pictures!
customer_reviews.text: Great zoom lens for a compact camera! Same elf quality as previously owned Canon cameras.
customer_reviews.author: SPB

customer_reviews.title: Canon PowerShot ELPH 510 HS
customer_reviews.text: Don't give much thought to the negative comments about this camera. Canon did an excellent job with this model. Read the directions and make the necessary changes and you will be very satisfied. The touch screen only requires calibration to your touch and it will respond just fine. Read and follow the directions! The pictures and video are excellent and the low light setting works great. Read and follow the directions!! Sound is great. Overall, a great camera.
customer_reviews.author: R. Garay

customer_reviews.title: OK
customer_reviews.text: EL PRODUCTO LLEGO OK, TAL Y COMO LO OFRECIERON ESTOY TOTALMENTE SATISFECHO CON EL MISMO. RECOMIENDO AL VENDEDOR ES BASTANTE RESPONSABLE
customer_reviews.author: David Heli Parrado Clavijo

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This camera was ordered to replace an earlier version that my wife had lost. The camera is fantastic! My features that did not exist on the earlier model.
customer_reviews.author: David E. Bohl

customer_reviews.title: great camera for the price
customer_reviews.text: it was on sale for $159.99 one day and it was purchased for a graduation present. it takes good pictures and a good overall point and shoot camera. it's slim and the coolest feature is it's a touch screen in the back.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Cannon Elph
customer_reviews.text: I love my little Elph.It has a fantastic zoom and takes great indoor and outdoor photos. Not the greatest for the dark or action shots, but compared to other small pocket cameras, this one is pretty dang good. Would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two elphs break, same problem
customer_reviews.text: Pictures varied in quality. My biggest problem: this is the second elph in which the lens has refused to retract. Both times just after the warranty expired. I was being careful but still it happened again. Fool me twice, shame on me.
customer_reviews.author: Professor

customer_reviews.title: Takes amazing pictures
customer_reviews.text: I've owned this camera about a year now and it takes amazing pictures. We initially bought it because of the great review this camera got in Consumer Reports magazine. It has several modes that you can use to take beautiful, creative photos. And it takes amazing photos in low light. We've owned several point and click cameras, but this one is by far the best. The battery lasts a long time. I love it better than my DSLR.
customer_reviews.author: M Salazar

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera! It takes great photos and video and is easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: Elph 510 Canon Camera
customer_reviews.text: Great little point and shoot camera. Very good color, even in low light. I had a Fujifilm F550exr, did not use the GPS on it, had trouble focusing in lower light movies. EPLH510 shoots very good outdoors of in low light. Nice zoom too.
customer_reviews.author: bndebt

customer_reviews.title: Really love this camera!!
customer_reviews.text: This camera is perfect for me who wants a small camera with high optical zoom and wide angle. The large touch screen makes it quite convenient to take and view photos. It also provides some built-in shooting situations that makes taking photos even more fun. And the silver case looks gorgeous! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: viola

customer_reviews.title: I regret I bought it
customer_reviews.text: The pictures are blurry. Tried to fix in in the camera (settings, tools) and nothing. Very bad quality. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: CS

customer_reviews.title: Taking pictures at any distance seems to make picture unfocused
customer_reviews.text: my review is the title. Beautiful shots if closer up...but not at a distance. Would look for something similar in price but better at further away shots.
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn J. Mayblum

customer_reviews.title: User Friendly
customer_reviews.text: I do like the user friendliness of Canon cameras. The manual is easy to read. My pictures look (almost) professional! :)
customer_reviews.author: Rosalind D. Guttman

customer_reviews.title: Typical Canon Excellence
customer_reviews.text: It does everything I need it to do. Lives up to its positive image per reviews I read before purchase. J W Hadbavny, Georgia
customer_reviews.author: John W. Hadbavny

customer_reviews.title: Canon PowerShot ELPH 510 HS 12.1 MP
customer_reviews.text: My son had a camera but wasn't happy with it. I have bought other Canon cameras and liked them. This one also very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: a.s.

customer_reviews.title: Great with light, struggles in the dark. Nice HD video.
customer_reviews.text: Great for outdoors and HD video and well-lit indoor shots. Slow to auto-focus and blurry/grainy in low light. Nice set of presets/effects. Wish the super-slo-mo recording setting had higher resolution. Macro/zoom seems to require a long distance to the subject, but the 4000x3000 resolution allows for some cropping afterward.
customer_reviews.author: Trent

customer_reviews.title: Love this camera
customer_reviews.text: I like all the features and the ease of use! It's compact size is great because I can slip it in my purse.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Great pics & great features.
customer_reviews.text: This camera takes really god pics, and has a lot of great features. Like the rapid shooting for capturing action shots. I wish the battery lasted longer tho.
customer_reviews.author: gg513

customer_reviews.title: Ok for price
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. The screen cracked and broke after about 6 months. It takes great pictures but now I can't see what I'm taking photos of and had to buy a new one.
customer_reviews.author: RenB

customer_reviews.title: love it!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use with wonderful clear pictures. Best little camera out there. Just the right size for your pocket to carry everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: C. Hayhoe

customer_reviews.title: Canon Digital
customer_reviews.text: After buying this camera I've only had opportunity to use it a little, but I'm already so very pleased with its picture quality. I'll have an opportunity to use it extensively beginning this month. So far, It is great!
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: not what I expected...
customer_reviews.text: Good size, good touch screen, good zoom but bad picture quality... Im a Canon fan. I have other big format cameras and they are awesome thats what I blindly trusted this product. Pictures are always blury even from static objects. Flash doesn't work well either. Not a good option for pocket cameras.
customer_reviews.author: ZEVA

customer_reviews.title: Canon Powershot
customer_reviews.text: Actually this camera was a gift for my wife to take on a vacation to Florida. She found that this camera takes great pictures and was easy to use. Also, because it is slim in size, it easily fits inside one of the compartments in her purse.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Cancialosi

customer_reviews.title: Run, do not walk, from this product!!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far one of the worst purchases I've ever made. The lense is defective, it won't work, and I am out two hundred bucks. Busy with work, I made the horrid mistake of not trying this product out right when it arrived. When I finally did try it out, it would not work. I am now out the money and regretting ever buying this thing.
customer_reviews.author: Cally

customer_reviews.title: Canon ELPH 510 HS
customer_reviews.text: Bought this camera for a trip. Did not read the guide before the trip. This camera has a lot of features, too many to just guess at how it works. What I figured out works really well.
customer_reviews.author: David Chu

customer_reviews.title: Rated great
customer_reviews.text: This camera was rated better then the New one that replaced it and I think the same this phone is great and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Gallop

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: Love it i just need to get use to the screen it is very touchie, the battery life seems short so make sure you get extras
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous Camera
customer_reviews.text: Great photos, easy to use, great size. We bought the Case Logic TBC-302 FFP Compact Camera Case (Black) and it is a perfect fit! Couldn't be happier! And if you don't know Canon has amazing great customer service!
customer_reviews.author: deb

customer_reviews.title: camera for trip
customer_reviews.text: Very prompt delivery for a great price..Camera takes great pictures. Also is very user friendly..... The 1080p video also works very good..look forward to more purchases from Amazon...
customer_reviews.author: cartechsteve

customer_reviews.title: powershot
customer_reviews.text: This canon powershot ELPH 510 is a good deal and it deserves the money. The red color looks nice, and it is easy to hold.
customer_reviews.author: hangyu

customer_reviews.title: Battery is not good
customer_reviews.text: This camera is cool and I used it extensively in last 30 days. Only problem is with battery, its too week. After 100+ snaps using zoom and all, battery discharges. I ordered for one set of backup battery.
customer_reviews.author: Vaibhav

customer_reviews.title: Nice camera
customer_reviews.text: After going through most of the functions, I believe this will be a good digital camera/video. Like most products, the user guide is very small print, however, the install cd has a pdf version. Will update this review after I have used the camera for a while.
customer_reviews.author: HGmusic

customer_reviews.title: elph 510
customer_reviews.text: i love the automatic exposure feature - with the manual override option. i love the index feature - viewing multiple images at a time. i dislike the fact that the battery needed to be recharged every couple days when i only took a few shots.
customer_reviews.author: chuck elliot

customer_reviews.title: Just like it says it is
customer_reviews.text: Nice size for my small hands. Easy to focus. Screen is nice size. Features abound. Would recommend for vacationers to have
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Stevenson

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!
customer_reviews.text: The camera was worth the price. It is quite light weight with small size and big lens. I would love to have the Memory Card included in the deal as well, but it it no big deal.
customer_reviews.author: Hieu D. Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Cannon ELPH510
customer_reviews.text: This is a great camera. the touch screen feature is perfect and pictures come out really great. Would highly recommend this cannon touch screen camera!! Missing a star, because it doesn't come with a camera case.
customer_reviews.author: ruby_shops

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: this camera has been perfect for small but takes great pictures
customer_reviews.author: Fabian G Vasquez

customer_reviews.title: Meh! Canon could have done a LOT better for what they were charging for this camera!
customer_reviews.text: 1- Uses Canon batteries only, buy spares if you plan to shoot all day without charging. 2- Photo quality is good. 3- LCD screen is not so good in BRIGHT daylight. 4- Video is saved in Quick-time format (some devices do not support format).
customer_reviews.author: SysAdmin/Babysitter

customer_reviews.title: canon power shot
customer_reviews.text: my brother gifted me this camera on my birthday.firstly, it looks great with nice pictures and when we upload them into pc the picture quality varies it looks dull. I tried all settings and it didn't work out. Its not worth buying.
customer_reviews.author: arjun

customer_reviews.title: Camera for wife
customer_reviews.text: My wife wanted a small,compact camera at a reasonable price. And ,one that was easy to operate. The battery life between charging far exceeds her previous camera.This camera fit her requirements, perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Eugene Oxender

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: I read all the reviews before ordering this camera....I must say, I love love love this camera. VERY user friendly! Absolutely FANTASTIC battery life!!!! Small and lightweight, I carry it with me all the time.... SO EASY to switch from taking a picture to making a video. I would totally recommend this camera to someone who wants to point and shoot....but it also has a bunch of fun features that I am just beginning to explore!
customer_reviews.author: Santa Fe Lady

customer_reviews.title: Canon ELPH 510
customer_reviews.text: Really nice camera. Great pictures and very good HD videos. I really like the red-eye correction feature built into the camera. Touch screen and "tap to advance" are also nice features.
customer_reviews.author: SteveQ

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic camera
customer_reviews.text: This is a great camera. The zoom is very sharp and the images blow up quite well. It makes excellent macros.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie Horst

customer_reviews.title: Sleek and quick
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived quickly and in perfect condition. Camera is excellent with quick shutter time, which makes a huge difference to me above other cameras. Highly recommended buy.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Davis

customer_reviews.title: This is very good camera
customer_reviews.text: Nice camera and very good pictures and LCD display. Has safety feature of auto close when not able to open lens properly. Good value for money item.
customer_reviews.author: Dilip Pandya

customer_reviews.title: crisp beautiful pics
customer_reviews.text: Even though I haven't quite figured out all the wonders of this camera, the weekend I purchased it I took fabulous pictures at my niece's wedding.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn S Gruenig

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good little camera
customer_reviews.text: The only thing it can't do that my old Elph did was to adjust the flash to be on all the time, to fill in. Otherwise, nice wide angle lens, takes great photos!
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: This is a great camera for the price...
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, pics are great, touchscreen on back is a delight! Like color too! Wide angle lens does a great job...I like to photograph marching bands.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis L. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Most Frustrating Camera
customer_reviews.text: Before I bought this Canon camera, I owned Sony and Olympus and was very happy with. I heard so much good things about Canon and I bought this ELPH510 just to found out the most unfriendly and frustrating camera. I have never succeeded to really used correctly and I have it for over a year. I will not buy it again
customer_reviews.author: meed

customer_reviews.title: A little awkward to manipulate
customer_reviews.text: Don't get me wrong . . . the pictures are great . . . but zooming in to look at a specific part of a picture isn't easy to do. Other than that, I really like this camera.
customer_reviews.author: Will Read for Fun

customer_reviews.title: Good camera, but protect its back screen.
customer_reviews.text: Served me well for 2 years and then somehow the screen on the back got cracked in my purse. Can still point and click but have no idea if it is taking the shot I want or in focus...
customer_reviews.author: Rowin

customer_reviews.title: The Best Canon
customer_reviews.text: This camera use CMOS matrix like DSLR cameras, have 12x optical and fullHD, so this is the best camera for this price
customer_reviews.author: speedway

customer_reviews.title: Nice camera
customer_reviews.text: Nice little camera takes awesome picture very clear! Would defiantly recommend. Very easy to use. Nice and small will fit in your pocket.
customer_reviews.author: TLH

customer_reviews.title: Took lousy pictures. Maybe an anomaly?
customer_reviews.text: Most reviews sounded good, but the ELPH 510 specimen that I received took really bad pictures. There was a "pale spot" in the middle of each picture (i.e., really low contrast, just in that spot). Also, the pictures were generally blurry and did not have good coloring. I've returned this one - time for me to give some other company a chance.
customer_reviews.author: pga

customer_reviews.title: Canon PowerShot Elp 510 HS
customer_reviews.text: This camera appears to fit all my needs to take quality pictures & video. I'm no expert but the camera is easy to use, is loaded with features (read the book to fully enjoy it) and the software to download your work is straight forward and user frendly not like some other brands I have used. The touch screen can be a little touchy but that should improve with use. Good product.
customer_reviews.author: LPxDrive

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera. It is easy to use. Battery charge lasts for months. Down loading the pictures to my computer is quick.
customer_reviews.author: Sexy Senior

customer_reviews.title: May return it
customer_reviews.text: I may return it. It doesn't have an eyepiece, which is my preferred to see my photo subjects. (The screen, in high light, reflects and makes seeing the subjects difficult.) Also, I am speculating that the specialty battery may be difficult or expensive to replace.
customer_reviews.author: George Skyles

customer_reviews.title: Overall a good compact camera
customer_reviews.text: I find the software overly complicated and unless I use it very frequently have to go back to the manual for a review. The zoom is quite adequate and the photos excellent. The touch screen is not difficult to use. The reason I bought it is for it's size, weight, price and telephoto lens. Overall, it's a good camera.
customer_reviews.author: Edwin V. Cooksey

customer_reviews.title: Nice one
customer_reviews.text: I have gifted this camera to my friend and he was happy to have this. He said its very good and the clarity are good.
customer_reviews.author: Durai

customer_reviews.title: Good one
customer_reviews.text: Capture all your special moments with this camera and cherish the memories over and over again. Super image processor, this camera lets you take smooth, detailed, and high-quality images. The monitor on this Canon makes it easy to view photos, read menu, and compose shots. With a high ISO sensitivity.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic all round camera
customer_reviews.text: Has some super features, excellent LCD, and take great photos We travelled for three months in China, Vietnam & Cambodia, took hundreds of photos and the results were as good as an SLR
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: NO media card!
customer_reviews.text: VERY disappointed that there was no card! I purchased this to use for Christmas, and was unable to because it did not come with a media card; I had to order that separate, which took another several days. It should have noted that the card needed to be purchased separately in the description.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa M Culberson

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This was not hard to set up and so far - pics are AWESOME! It is compact and carries well.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary M. Moors

customer_reviews.title: Canon ELPH 510
customer_reviews.text: Having other Canon products this performed as expected-great. Battery life was a little less than expected so I bought a second battery.
customer_reviews.author: CRAIG

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Broke after about 1 year producing very washed out pictures
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great little camera
customer_reviews.text: I am very satisfied with this product. User friendly, it takes great, clear, sharp photos. I just recently went to Costa Rica and the quality of the pictures was awesome (not to mention CR!!) I am not tech-saavy but this is an easy camera for me to use ... just point and shoot, however, there are some aps that make for some fun photo-shooting too, like the fish-eye and color enhancement features. Decently priced, too.
customer_reviews.author: Janice

customer_reviews.title: Keep Looking for your sure shot!
customer_reviews.text: The service provided by Amazon was flawless as usual but this product with the touch screen was less than perfect, its kinda like a IPad wannabe but unfortunately isnt so stick the the IPad for Ipad functions and with a camera for camera functions.This was a poor attempt at combining the two. Touch function was frustrating at times to work with and battery life was less than most.
customer_reviews.author: JulianB.

product_meta.title: Canon PowerShot ELPH 510 HS 12.1 MP CMOS Digital Camera with Full HD Video and Ultra Wide Angle Lens (Black)
product_meta.description:
Color:BlackWorld’s thinnest camera with 28mm Wide-Angle lens, 12x Optical Zoom, and Optical Image Stabilizer. 12.1 Megapixel CMOS image sensor combined with Canon’s DIGIC 4 Image Processor creates the Canon HS SYSTEM for outstanding low-light performance up to ISO 3200. Capture stunning Full HD 1080p video in stereo sound with a dedicated movie button, zoom while shooting and play back videos on an HDTV via the HDMI output. A 3.2-inch wide touch panel LCD offers easy and intuitive operation, and Touch-shutter makes shooting easy and interactive. High-Speed Burst Mode allows continuous shooting and Super Slow Motion Movie records video at high speeds to allow playback in slow motion. Intelligent IS automatically chooses from six different modes to optimize image stabilization for the shooting condition. Improved Smart AUTO intelligently selects the proper settings for the camera based on 32 predefined shooting situations. Movie Digest Mode records a short video clip right before shooting a photo and then combines one day’s worth of clips into one video. There is no SD card included.


FROM THE MANUFACTURER
 The Leading Edge of Design and Technology

Beautifully and Astonishingly Thin
At a slim 0.86 inches, the PowerShot ELPH 510 HS is the world’s thinnest camera with a 28mm Wide-Angle lens, 12x Optical Zoom, and Optical Image Stabilizer.* Its stylish form is enhanced by its lustrous finish, which gives you a choice of three refined colors: Red, Black and Silver. But real beauty goes beyond skin deep with the PowerShot ELPH 510 HS. Amazingly, Canon did not sacrifice performance for style. 

*As of August 23, 2011

12x Optical Zoom with 28mm Wide-Angle Lens
The PowerShot ELPH 510 HS features a powerful Genuine Canon 12x Zoom Lens that delivers outstanding optical performance and versatility. Fitting such a high-performance lens with such wide zoom range into a camera so thin would normally be considered an impossible feat. Canon’s expert optical engineering met the challenge by developing a light-folding retractable-prism lens barrel, which achieves outstanding compactness with high zoom power and superb performance. The zoom starts at 28mm wide-angle and extends to 336mm telephoto (35mm equivalent), covering an exceptionally wide range. The telephoto reach gives you the freedom to capture subjects from a considerable distance, while the 28mm wide-angle makes it easy to shoot sweeping landscapes, large groups of people and tall buildings. 

Optical Image Stabilizer
Handheld shooting can often lead to camera shake, making photos and videos blurry. Canon’s Optical Image Stabilizer is a sophisticated system that uses lens-shift technology to correct for unwanted camera movement. It makes handheld photography more practical, providing excellent image quality in many difficult shooting situations: outdoors at dusk, inside without a flash, and even at the telephoto end of the zoom range without a tripod. For photos, it enables shooting at slower shutter speeds, accommodating more low-light shooting situations than ever before without having to boost ISO sensitivity. With camera shake and vibration reduced, you get a sharper, steadier image. And because it is an optical system, there is none of the image degradation typical with electronic image stabilizers.

Experience the Power

Canon HS SYSTEM
The Canon HS SYSTEM lets you take bright, clear photos in an even wider range of shooting situations. Beautiful low-light shots are possible with minimal noise and maximum detail in highlight and shadow areas. The system is the result of two technologies brought together in PowerShot cameras: a high-sensitivity imaging sensor, which is able to capture more light; and the DIGIC Image Processor, which actively reduces noise with high-speed image processing. The 12.1 Megapixel CMOS sensor in the PowerShot ELPH 510 HS incorporates advanced light reception technology that enhances sensitivity. The DIGIC 4 Image Processor provides a major boost in noise reduction, expanding the usable ISO range to an amazing high of 3200. The Canon HS SYSTEM takes the frustration out of low-light shooting, delivering clear, blur-free images.

Canon DIGIC 4 Image Processor
Canon DIGIC Image Processors have set the standard for functionality and performance since their groundbreaking introduction in 1999. With each successive generation, DIGIC processors have brought elevated performance and powerful new features to PowerShot digital cameras. The DIGIC 4 processor has ushered in a new level of picture quality and accelerated processing, making possible features such as high-speed continuous shooting, Full HD video and Face Detection Self-timer. New, more powerful noise reduction algorithms also provide improved low-light capture.

Memorable Moments in Spectacular Full HD

Canon Full HD Video Advantage
In addition to the Canon HS SYSTEM, the combination of the advanced CMOS sensor and DIGIC 4 Image Processor in the PowerShot ELPH 510 HS makes it possible to shoot crisp, clear high definition video. Imagine the fun and excitement of being able to shoot spectacular 1080p Full HD video with stereo sound that you can later watch on your HDTV or download to your computer to share with family and friends. In addition to being able to shoot Full HD 1080p video at 24* frames per second, the PowerShot ELPH 510 HS can also shoot 720p HD video at 30** frames per second.

*Actual frame rate is 23.976 fps.
** Actual frame rate is 29.97 fps.

HDTV playback via HDMI output and CEC
It’s easy to enjoy and share the videos you shoot with the PowerShot ELPH 510 HS. Simply connect its HDMI terminal to your HDTV using an HDMI cable. And because the PowerShot ELPH 510 HS supports HDMI-CEC technology, you’ll be able to control the playback of your images and videos on any CEC-enabled HDTV using the TV’s remote control. (CEC – Consumer Electronic Control – is part of the HDMI specification, enabling components in a system to communicate with one another.)

iFrame
With the PowerShot ELPH 510 HS, you can also shoot video in the Apple iFrame format, which is a computer-friendly standard that speeds up importing and editing of videos. It keeps file sizes small, making it more convenient to upload or e-mail high-quality videos. The iFrame format enjoys native support in compatible Mac and Windows video applications, making it unnecessary to perform time-consuming and often quality-degrading conversions.


Get the Shot You Want with Just a Touch

PureColor LCD System
The PowerShot ELPH 510 HS digital camera’s large and bright 3.2-inch PureColor LCD wide screen makes it easy to view and frame your shots in high resolution (461,000 dots). PureColor technology delivers excellent contrast with rich, true-to-life color. Moreover, you can view the LCD screen over a surprisingly wide angle – above, below or to either side – without color shifts and with minimal reflections. A scratch-proof hard coating and a dust-repellent fluorine coating ensure a durable screen that dependably displays clear, vibrant images. The wide aspect ratio (16:9) provides ample room for information icons and touch buttons, preventing them from getting in the way of the image, and you can enjoy a brilliant full-screen image when shooting or playing back your Full HD videos.

Touch Panel LCD with Touch Shutter
The PowerShot ELPH 510 HS features touch panel technology that makes using the camera more intuitive and fun. Simply touch the screen to choose and track an AF point, change camera settings, record and play videos and much, much more! It also has an innovative Touch Shutter function that allows you to release the shutter right from the screen. Just touch the desired subject with your finger. An AF box will appear and track the subject as it moves. Then just lift your finger to release the shutter. It’s that simple.

A PowerShot that Keeps Up with the Action

High-Speed Burst Mode
Capture amazing action shots like the pros with the PowerShot ELPH 510 HS camera. Using High-Speed Burst mode,* you can shoot at exceptionally high speeds – 7.8 frames per second. It’s a great feature for those who enjoy taking pictures at sporting events. High-Speed Burst is also an excellent way to make sure you capture that perfect instant in time when shooting any moving subject.

*Image resolution is 1984 x 1488 pixels when shooting in High-Speed Burst mode.

Super Slow Motion
The Super Slow Motion Movie mode* on the PowerShot ELPH 510 HS gives you a fun and useful option when shooting videos. It records video clips at a very high speed – up to approximately 240 frames per second. When the clips are played at normal speed (30 fps), the action is dramatically slower. This video shooting mode can be used to capture memorable plays at sporting events or to analyze and study motion. 

*Records 640 x 480 pixels at 120 fps and 320 x 420 pixels at 240 fps.

A Steady Image Is a Beautiful Image

Intelligent IS
The latest advance in Canon Optical Image Stabilization technology, Intelligent IS analyzes camera movement and applies the best shake correction method for the shooting situation. For stills, the system automatically selects among Normal, Panning, Macro (Hybrid) and Tripod IS modes. When shooting video, the system automatically selects among Dynamic, Powered, Macro and Tripod IS modes. With Intelligent IS, you can concentrate on image capture, letting the camera make the most effective IS settings to assure the steadiest possible image. 



Normal
Corrects for a wide range of camera movement when shooting stills. Panning
Panning motion is detected so that IS does not interfere with desired camera movement. Hybrid
Corrects for shift-type camera shake, which typically occurs in macro (close-up) shooting. Dynamic
Effective for video shooting at wide-angle focal lengths, eliminating the unwanted shaking that typically occurs while walking. Powered
Compensates for hand movement when shooting video at the telephoto end of the zoom range, where camera shake is magnified. Tripod
When tripod use is detected, the Image Stabilizer is stopped because it is not needed. 
A Smarter Camera Means Better Photos and Videos

Smart AUTO
Photographers of all levels appreciate a camera – especially a go-anywhere compact digital – that takes the hassle out of capturing beautiful images. The PowerShot ELPH 510 HS gives you Smart AUTO – sophisticated Canon technology that makes getting that great shot as simple as pressing the shutter button. Smart AUTO automatically detects scenes by assessing various factors in both the background and the subject. Detected scenes are analyzed using 32 predefined shooting situations. The camera then makes optimal settings to ensure the best possible image capture, whether you’re shooting stills or video. Smart AUTO also includes Advanced Subject Detection, which allows the camera to detect and track non-human moving subjects like animals and vehicles. With Smart AUTO, all you have to do is frame your shot and capture away.

Shooting Modes/Special Scene Modes
Smart AUTO
The camera automatically selects the best shooting settings for optimal quality based on subjects and environmental factors to provide point-and-shoot simplicity.
Kids & Pets Reduced focusing time freezes fast-moving subjects, so you won't miss those special shots. Portrait 
The camera sets a large aperture, focusing the subject and artistically blurring the background to make your subject “pop.”
High-Speed Burst The camera shoots continuously at a high speed while you hold down the shutter.
Low Light For high quality image capture in an amazing range of dimly-lit situations.
Toy Camera Effect Simulates photos taken with "toy" or pinhole cameras, darkening the image at the edges to create a vignette effect.
Poster Effect Poster Effect combines several similar shades into one color, turning subtle gradations into eye-catching, scene-popping contrasts.
Beach Beach Get clear shots of people at a sunny beach without darkened faces.
Fireworks Grab brilliant images of skyrocketing fireworks.
Super Slow Motion Movie Record your clips in high speed (approx. 240 fps), and then watch your videos in slow motion.
Program Access advanced exposure compensation features while shooting mostly automatically.
Fisheye Effect Add a classic photo distortion without a fisheye lens.
Best Image Selection The camera takes five photos in succession, and then chooses the best one out of the bunch.
Monochrome Choose from three single-tone effects: Black-and-White, Sepia, or Blue.
Color Accent Choose to retain a single color in your image while other colors turn monochrome.
Foliage Capture brilliant shots of autumn foliage, greenery and blossoms.
Long Shutter Use to blur moving subjects for artistic effect, ideal for urban night photography.
Movie Digest Records a video clip before capturing a still image and then combines one day’s worth of clips into a video.
Smart Shutter The camera automatically takes the photo when people smile, wink, or get into frame.
Handheld Night Scene Suppresses image blur even without the help of a tripod.
Miniature Effect for Movies & Stills Emphasizes perspectives for a miniature effect by blurring upper and bottom portions of the image.
Super Vivid Super Vivid intensifies existing hues, saturating the scene with bright colors.

Color Swap Select a color and replace it with a color you specify for special effects.
Snow Shoot clear snow scenes without darkened subjects or an unnatural bluish tint.
iFrame Movie The Apple® movie format, iFrame, makes it easier and quicker to import and upload videos while retaining high image quality.


Easier, More Enjoyable Photography

Face Detection Technology including Smart Shutter
Special Scene Modes
Best Image Selection

What's in the Box
PowerShot ELPH 510 HS Body 
• Battery Pack NB-9L
• Battery Charger CB-2LB
• Wrist Strap WS-DC10
• USB Interface Cable IFC-400PCU
• Digital Camera Solution CD-ROM

12.1 Megapixel CMOS Image Sensor and DIGIC 4 Image Processor
Full HD Video Recording at 1080p in Stereo Sound
Smart AUTO Funciton Based on 32 Predefined Shooting Situations
